title: ROS World 2021: Simulating multiple mobile warehouse robots
description: A workshop on how to use a game engine and ROS2 to simulate multiple mobile robots that perform object pose estimation in order to complete a “find-and-ferry” task.

title: Introducing: Unity Robotics Visualizations Package
description: With this toolkit for visualizing the state of robotics simulations, Unity can be used as an all-in-one ROS simulation and visualization tool.

title: Teaching robots to see with Unity
description: In this demo, we show you how to use the Unity Computer Vision Perception Package to collect data and train a deep learning model to predict the pose of a given object.

title: Robotics simulation in Unity is as easy as 1, 2, 3!
description: Robot development workflows rely on simulation for testing and training, and we want to show you how roboticists can use Unity for robotics simulation.
